org.apache.bookkeeper.bookie

Class BookieShell

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.bookkeeper.bookie.BookieShell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.bookkeeper.util.Tool

    public class BookieShell
extends Object
implements org.apache.bookkeeper.util.Tool
    Bookie Shell is to provide utilities for users to administer a bookkeeper cluster.

      • scanEntryLogForSpecificEntry

        protected void scanEntryLogForSpecificEntry(long logId,
                                            long lId,
                                            long eId,
                                            boolean printMsg)
                                     throws Exception
        Scan over an entry log file for a particular entry
        Parameters:
        logId - Entry Log File id.
        ledgerId - id of the ledger
        entryId - entryId of the ledger we are looking for (-1 for all of the entries of the ledger)
        printMsg - Whether printing the entry data.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • scanEntryLogForPositionRange

        protected void scanEntryLogForPositionRange(long logId,
                                            long rangeStartPos,
                                            long rangeEndPos,
                                            boolean printMsg)
                                     throws Exception
        Scan over an entry log file for entries in the given position range
        Parameters:
        logId - Entry Log File id.
        rangeStartPos - Start position of the entry we are looking for
        rangeEndPos - End position of the entry we are looking for (-1 for till the end of the entrylog)
        printMsg - Whether printing the entry data.
        Throws:
        Exception
